definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: a little, a trifle, a few.
of time [[עוֹד מְעַט מִזְעָָר]] Is 10:25, Is 29:17 yet a trifle, a little = a very little while.
of number [[מְעַט מִזְעָר שְׁאָר]] Is 16:14 a remnant, a very few (opp. [[לוֹא כַּ בִּיר]]). In Is:Is 3 without [[מעט]]:—[[ונשׁאר אנושׁ]]:[[מִזְעָֽר ]] Is 24:6.
